definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
General Douglas MacArthur (1880-1964), US commander in Pacific during WW2, sacked in 1951 by President Truman for exceeding orders during the Korean war
McMillan or MacMillan (name)/Harold Macmillan (1894-1986), UK conservative politician, prime minister 1957-1963
Macbeth (name)/Macbeth, 1606 tragedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚
Maxwell (name)/James Clerk Maxwell (1831-1879), Scottish physicist and mathematician, the originator of Maxwell's laws of electromagnetism and electromagnetic waves
see 巨無霸漢堡包指數|巨无霸汉堡包指数[Ju4 wu2 ba4 han4 bao3 bao1 Zhi3 shu4]
General Douglas MacArthur (1880-1964), US commander in Pacific during WW2, sacked in 1951 by President Truman for exceeding orders during the Korean war
pinyin: Dao4 ge2 la1 si1 · Mai4 ke4 a1 se4

sentences.english: Look, Mike. Here'rethe jade bracelets you want.
sentences.chinese: 麦克，你看，这儿有你要买的玉手镯。

sentences.english: Direct the DSAS's microphone towards the source of sound.
sentences.chinese: 指令员的麦克风对源头的声音。

sentences.english: To some extent, this is just as McLuhan predicted.
sentences.chinese: 从某种意义上说，这正如麦克卢汉所预言的那样。

sentences.english: This is a key-word in Macbeth.
sentences.chinese: 这是《麦克白》中的一句关键的话。

sentences.english: It's a good idea to use two of the same model with the overheads.
sentences.chinese: 用两支和OH麦相同型号的麦克是一个不错的主意。

sentences.english: "We hardly get sick at all, " Mrs McKamey says hopefully.
sentences.chinese: “我们根本不怎么得病，”麦克康美太太自我安慰说。

sentences.english: Mike is sewing a button on his coat.
sentences.chinese: 麦克在给他的大衣钉扣子。

sentences.english: Max didn't even want to think about the Garudan slaves.
sentences.chinese: 麦克斯甚至不愿去想嘎鲁达的奴隶们。

sentences.english: Macdonald felt that the situation was urgent.
sentences.chinese: 麦克唐纳感到情况紧急。

sentences.english: C:It's a privilege to know you, Mr. McNiel.
sentences.chinese: 很荣幸能认识你，麦克尼尔先生。

sentences.english: McMurphy Heh, YOU'D like it, wouldn't you?
sentences.chinese: 麦克默菲哦，你喜欢吃它，对吗？

sentences.english: When you are recording video, it will use the secondary mic for the sound.
sentences.chinese: 当你在录制视频时，他会使用第二个麦克风录音。

sentences.english: What will the weather be like tomorrow, Mac?
sentences.chinese: 麦克，明天天手气怎么样？

sentences.english: Programmer Paul Newell is responsible for building the rigs to McNally's specifications.
sentences.chinese: 程序员保罗尼维尔负责麦克纳利的特效编写程序。

sentences.english: When the MacArthur hit, I was behind in the rent.
sentences.chinese: 当初获得麦克阿瑟奖时，我还有租金要还。
